name: THE FALL (itch) (Ameidox)
description:
THE FALL

THE FALL is a Unique and Challenging Pixel Art Platformer where the binds are joined together. Play as a fox which is trying to get to somewhere.

GMTK JAM

THE FALL is a game for the GMTK Game Jam, this year the theme was joined together.

THE FALL fits the theme with it's binding mechanic. 

When the Player picks up a powerup (such as a DASH, maybe even a DOUBLE JUMP)

the Player will be given the option to choose what key the powerup will be binded to out of three buttons: RIGHT ARROW, LEFT ARROW and SPACE, when to different powerup  are binded to the same key they'll be  joined together. and when you press the key - you preform every action on that key.

HOW TO PLAY

You can play the game in the Browser, though if you'll like to have the best playing experience I recommend Downloading the game, the game is available on every platform - Windows, Mac and Linux..

Just follow this steps: 

  1. Download the file 
  2. Right click on the downloaded zip and "Extract All" to a folder.
  3. Enter the new folder and run "THE FALL.exe"
  4. This is it! Now have fun!
CREATORS:

Game by - Ameidox

Music by - Nathanael Hueso
